blog.name: mackmeta
blog.title: Meta, Analysis, and Speculation
blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: Josh said ''important plot drivers'' were moved from 318 to 317 or 319 what do you think he means?
question: Josh said ''important plot drivers'' were moved from 318 to 317 or 319 what do you think he means?
answer:
I think he meant what we already knew, that while 3x18 was cut in its entirety they replaced the key scenes in that ep with re-shot footage of old scenes or by filming completely new scenes and most of those moments will now appear in 3x17 or 3x19 (he seems to be using production order). The two biggest moments in 3x18 would have been Bexie getting married and Muffy getting together; those moments didn’t need to be in 3x18 itself but they do need to happen for the story to make sense.

We already know that the new pro basketball players visiting the school plot line was shot to replace the lost Muffy scenes at the original wedding and it looks like the Muffy bowling plot is now in 3x16 so the basketball players plot is likely going to be slotted in to 3x17 which would fit with what Josh said.

It’s harder to tell when the new Bexie wedding will be. We know from the ep description and the promo that Bowie tells Bex in 3x16 that he still wants to get married so it has to happen sometime after that ep. If the wedding has to come fairly early for plot reasons than 3x17 would likely have room for a Mack family only wedding since there would have been Ham scenes they needed to cut. Or they could have re-worked the outdoor event in 3x20 to be a new wedding.

I’m not sure what would be moved into 3x19 though, it seems odd to have a Bexie wedding in that ep when they could have just waited another ep and have it at the gazebo in 3x20. They also had only one unaccounted for day of re-shoots for what probably were Mack family scenes. Maybe there was some convo between Bowie and Bex about maybe having another kid or Celia telling Bex that she’s giving her sole ownership of Cloud 10 that needed to be salvaged. They filmed all of 3x18 at Snuck Farm but it is possible that they filmed a cold open or post script scene on one of the sets as they frequently film scenes for two different eps at Cloud 10 or the Red Rooster on the same day and were able to move it to another ep. We’ll find out soon enough.

summary:
Here's the thing
Cyrus is the kind of guy who would be friends with anyone, even if they've been mean to his own friends. He's...
body:
Here’s the thing

Cyrus is the kind of guy who would be friends with anyone, even if they’ve been mean to his own friends. He’s really open to hearing both sides of the story and to try to understand both people. We know that because he tried to make Amber and Buffy become friends in “We’re on cloud Ten” ,with the argument that ‘Amber never really did anything to her in particular’

And let’s not forget that Cyrus himself had been friends with TJ while he was still being a jerk to Buffy (which btw did not go well)

So, my point is that Cyrus has no valid reason for being disappointed with TJ and Kira’s newborn friendship!

He can’t say 'Kira was mean to Buffy so I’m disappointed that TJ is friends with her’. That would be pure hypocrisy BECAUSE HE WAS OUT THERE BEFRIENDING TJ WHILE HE WAS STILL BEING A JERK TO HIS BEST FRIEND!

So unless TJ completely abandons him for Kira, Cyrus has no valid argument to justify his disappointment with them being friends.

Obviously, he won’t admit that, but I’m wondering if maybe he’s gonna act upon that jealousy and we’ll get to see a whole new side to our Cyrus, a side that is 100% heart and 0% therapist friend who tries to do everything right.

The thing is that he’s jealous.

summary: so i saw someone else being this up but in the previous episodes you can tj roll up his sleeves, i guess kind of symbolizing him...
question: so i saw someone else being this up but in the previous episodes you can tj roll up his sleeves, i guess kind of symbolizing him “peeling back his layers”? but then in the recent promo we see his sleeves rolled down again. i don’t know if i’m reading too much into this lol but we can see him slowly opening up but then kira the bitch shows up and he starts to go back to his old ways i guess and hides his feelings because of her
answer: I mean, I think this likely has more to do with when the episodes were filmed rather than intentional symbolism. The first time that TJ wore the camo hoodie, the episode was filmed in the summer when it would have been warmer. I’m pretty sure that 315 was filmed in like October, when it would have been significantly cooler. But accidental symbolism is fun too so have fun with your reaching lmao.

tags: im sorry if its not very exciting
summary:
THEORY TIME 
(this is pretty long so bear with me)
based on @tyguygoodman’s post about how cyrus was with jonah, andi and buffy...
body:
THEORY TIME

(this is pretty long so bear with me)

based on @tyguygoodman’s post about how cyrus was with jonah, andi and buffy IN the dumpster but doesn’t leave the dumpster with them, @somersaulty‘s picture of the overhead view of the swing set, along with all the other cyrus clips in the promos and the summaries i have a (hopefully) plausible theory for Unloading Zone:

* we know buffy suspects tj has a crush on cyrus already, from the texts after One in a Minyan

* so this assumes jonah knows about cyrus’ crush on tj from the campout in Hammer Time, and buffy gathers that cyrus ALSO has a crush on tj

* (either from texts or at some point in 3x14 or earlier in 3x15)

* the ghc+jonah plan to expose vivian (who i assume runs the company) for her wasteful clothing company by digging through the store’s dumpster out back

* cyrus backs out last minute because he thinks it’s a bit too risky and doesn’t want to unnecessarily get in trouble

* (i guess, similar to how he backed out of the mount rushmore costume)

* he decides to go to the swings to chill

* MEANWHILE

* tj and kira are at the swings because kira made tj come

* tj is trying to have a good time but he can’t because he misses cyrus

* the other post i made about the tj/kira swing scene comes in here

*however instead of tj leaving, he notices cyrus (which i will explain later on)

*(the tj/kira swing theory isn’t based on anything but that one clip so it isn’t OFFICIALLY part of this theory but it’s related so i linked it)

* from the picture and the promo you can tell that tj is on the left and kira is on the right and they are facing away from the slide

* when tj jumps off the swing (along with kira) he goes down and TURNS AROUND, almost as though he’s facing kira

*(the following clip is playing at x0.25 speed)

* if he were to look further ahead in this direction he would be able to see cyrus approaching the swings on the other end (ie tj and cyrus’ swings)

* (this could be why they didn’t show any more of that scene in the promo and stuck to the 1 nanosecond that i had to replay in slow motion a million times)

* tj notices cyrus AND cyrus notices tj

* cyrus says “kira?” to himself (assuming that’s what you see him mouthing in the promo (thank you @green-lemonboys for pointing it out to me)) and starts walking away

* as he walks away, he looks back at tj (our first cyrus lookback (at tj) (i think))

* cyrus is distraught and ends up rejoining andi, buffy and jonah at the dumpster

* (which is where the split screen portion of the promo comes in)

* they’re all sitting in the (same) dumpster looking for clothes

* cyrus keeps getting text alerts (from tj)

* since jonah knows, perhaps he asks something like “is that tj?”

* (with a slightly worried expression on his face as we see in the promo)

* to which cyrus replies “yes” (or a variant of the like)

* buffy looks at cyrus knowingly

* andi is confused because she doesn’t know anything about it but eventually she realises

* (hence the realisation face in the promo)

* (again this is assuming the realisation isn’t about her parents or the company etc)

* when andi finally figures it out, cyrus tells them what he saw

* someone maybe says something like “if he saw you walk away and he’s texting you then he probably has a good reason”

* cyrus agrees and leaves his friends to go talk to tj OR leaves to go home (i can’t say for sure because there’s no indication of what happens to cyrus in the promos or the episode summary) because he is confused (and rightly so)

* since cyrus has gone, it’s only andi, buffy and jonah carrying out the garbage bags

* (this isn’t particularly part of the theory but it kind of fits:)

* (based off a confession post i saw on instagram) cyrus goes to tj’s house and knocks on his door

* tj opens the door with kira and says “cyrus”

* and the episode ends

* OR

* cyrus goes home and there’s a knock at the door

* he opens it and all he says is “tj?”

* and the episode ends

* (the second one was mostly the instagram confession post i saw)

* (this theory is null and void if @green-lemonboys’ theory about the dumpster portal turns out to be true)

* thank you for coming to my TED talk

blog.description:
🏳️‍🌈16y/o she/her bi🏳️‍🌈

Mostly Andi Mack and Druck

summary: What characters in Andi Mack and Druck do you think are similar to one another? 💗
question: What characters in Andi Mack and Druck do you think are similar to one another? 💗
answer:
OMG get ready for a rant

I have actually thought A LOT about this lol

I have done a few parallels with Davenzi and Tyrus already and I have been trying to figure out who’s who. In one way has TJ/David and Cyrus/Matteo similarities. For example Cy and Matteo being the “lazy” gays, and David and TJ being the athletic gays. But on the other hand. Both David and Cyrus wants to work with film and Matteo and Tj are not as “artsy” as them (even tho I love the hc that Tj secretly is art hoe) So basically I think they are a little bit of everything.

I don’t really know what similarities I could think of in the other characters but Jonas and Jonah are honestly the same person lol

This probably didn’t make any sense lol
